pci_projects_project_storages_instance-b: You have not created an instance backup yet.
Get a backup service for your instances.

With backup instances, you can back up your instances at anytime. The system disk is copied and transferred on to a separate storage space. Your backups will then be used to reboot the original instance, or boot new instances based on this system disk.
Backup instances are part of the catalogue of system images. They are particularly useful for deployment and industrialisation steps.
To create an instance backup, you need to have created at least one instance.
Transfer an instance backup from one datacenter to another
Find out how to transfer an instance backup from one datacenter to another, preserving the configuration and state of the instance
